snippet.title: Data mining 8 Trailer
snippet.description:
This game on Steam store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1326330/Data_mining_8/

This game on Itch.io store: https://blender-games.itch.io/data-mining-8

Data mining 8 - casual colorful minimalist puzzle in which you have to collect all the files that are not corrupted to exit the closed circle.

Data mining 8 - casual colorful minimalist puzzle in which you have to collect all the files that are not corrupted to exit the closed circle.
The player's goal is to collect all data files, avoiding obstacles and traps, after which the previously closed pass will open to pass the level.

In Data mining 8:
- 50 levels
- Explosions
- Traps
- Portals
- Decelerators
- Accelerators
- Colorful art
- Cool Soundtrack
- Achievements

Subscribe to our social networks:

¤ Our group on Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/BlenderGames

¤ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvHzKFgdeYsySm_ieEGPFcA

¤ Twitter: https://twitter.com/blender_games

¤ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BlenderGames

¤ Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/blendergamez

¤ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/blender_games

¤ Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/blendergames
